website_summaries.verdict: A unique party favor that can be used and enjoyed by everyone.
pros: Mini tape measure key chains are handy and adorable
Measures up to 3 feet and comes in a set of 6
Even includes a side lock to keep the measuring tape in place
A unique gift that your guests didn’t know they needed
cons: Plastic casing is a little more fragile than a normal tape measure

customer_reviews.title: Tools for Women
customer_reviews.text: I gave these as party favors for the men at the event and had something else for the women. The women took the tape measures from the men saying they always wanted something like this to fit in their bag when shopping and needed to check measurments.
customer_reviews.author: Big Ed Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A necessity for the keychain.
customer_reviews.text: Small and always available tape for use in a store or the barn or else where. Not too sturdy and no one would use them for actual work, but cheap and instantly replaceable when one breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Small tape measurers
customer_reviews.text: These little tape measures are so nice. I am putting them into my boy's OCC boxes. They are a cute size and work well.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Brooker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect party favor
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect party favor for a construction themed birthday party. I got small construction trucks for the little ones and the tape measures for the older boys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small and Light
customer_reviews.text: Everyone needs to measure things once in a while. You can keep one of these in your pocket or purse, one in your desk. another in the car or at work. If you lose one, well it didn't cost much.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis P

customer_reviews.title: I’m very happy with these!!!! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Great party favor for 5 year old boys!!!! They work well and can be useful for projects with little ones.
customer_reviews.author: watersong

customer_reviews.title: Different goody bag filler!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun goody bag filler that is actually useful. I am using it for adult goody bags - everyone needs a measuring tape at one time or another.
customer_reviews.author: L. Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used as a party favor. Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute kid gifts
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my sons “dirty 3rdy” birthday party as favors and his friends loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Weichert

customer_reviews.title: Mini mighty tape
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandsons, to encourage the reading of numbers, the concepts of measurements and size. I hope to take it on walks with them to measure everything along the way. It’s also a handy purse-size tool for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for tabletop game work
customer_reviews.text: Gave two each to my husband's friends and husband for their tabletop game. The guys loved them especially the second backup one since they always lose their measuring tapes.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So handy to carry in your pocket. I carry mine every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jim LaNier PE

customer_reviews.title: Made my great nephew's day!
customer_reviews.text: I have a great nephew who keeps taking his Nana's tape measure. He was so excited when he got one and consequently wanted to take it home. She let him because she had 5 in reserve! They both loved them!
customer_reviews.author: P Lou

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for our grandsons Easter baskets! They love any type of carpenter tools.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Braker

customer_reviews.title: Useful for crafts and such
customer_reviews.text: Small and handy but a little fragile. Not for carpentry use.
customer_reviews.author: j. brian pearson

customer_reviews.text: It is like a toy. The measure tape is ok, but the case is plastic
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Decent tape measure, perfect for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Tape measures I provided for my son’s class when his dad when on for career day.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Fulmer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described- missing items
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it as set of 6 tapes, but got just 2 tapes
customer_reviews.author: R Shraga

product_meta.title: ArtCreativity 1.5 Inch Tape Measure Keychains for Kids and Adults - Set of 6 - Functional Mini Tape Measures with Stable Slide Lock - Birthday Party Favors, Goody Bag Fillers, Prize for Boys and Girls
product_meta.description:
AWESOME KEYCHAINS THAT BRING ON THE FUNCTIONALITY

Sample the Coolness

Have a thing for collecting unique keychains? Looking for unique little gifts that will strike a chord with both kids and adults? 
Then you’ll love these 1.5” mini tape measure keychains! They might be fun-sized but they don’t skimp on the functionality. 
They are accurately graduated to measure up to 3 feet and come complete with a slide lock that holds the measuring blade
in place. No more rummaging through drawers and cabinets whenever there is need for a tape measure. Just whip out your
keys and save the day like a boss.

Great for Gifting

Whether you’re looking for party favors for your little one’s birthday party, construction-themed party supplies, prizes for that
kids’ carnival or contest, or just a cool gift to make your cutie pie’s day, these tape measure keychains are guaranteed to be 
a hit! Every set comes with 6 key chains backed by a 100% money-back guarantee to give you total peace of mind. Inspire a 
rush of smiles and giggles without having anything to lose.

Here’s why you’ll love these unique key chains:


 - 6 keychains in form of a tape measure!

 - Measure just 1.5” for amazing portability and convenience.

 - The mini tape measures stretch up to 3 feet.

 - Fitted with a stable slide lock to hold the measuring blade in place.

 - The tape blade retracts smoothly once the lock is released.

 - Designed to comfortably fit in the hand while measuring.

 - Make a great party favor, gift, or prize for kids ages 8+ and adults.

 - Backed by a no-hassle, 100% money-back guarantee.

Click ‘Add to Cart’ now to get uber-cool keychains complete risk-free!
feature_bullets: DESIGNED TO IMPRESS: Comes in a pack of 6. A keychain in the form of a tape measure! Both kids and adults will love these unique key holders. They feature a 1.5” mini tape measure with a durable key ring attached. Lightweight and ultra-portable, they turn every set of keys into a handy tool oozing with coolness.

PROPER FUNCTIONALITY: These miniature tape measures aren’t a gimmick. They measure up to 3 feet (1 meter), have a stable slide lock that holds the measuring blade securely in position, retract smoothly whenever you release the lock, and comfortably fit in the hand.

AWESOME PARTY FAVOR: Looking for birthday party favors that will have those boys and girls smiling from ear to ear? These fun goody bag fillers complement any theme. They easily fit in most goodie bags and can even be used as unique Christmas stocking stuffers for kids and adults.

FUN PRIZE AND GIFT: These super cool keyholders are a guaranteed hit for children ages 8+. They make memorable contest or carnival prizes, classroom rewards that every student will want to get, a cool gift for that D.I.Y-loving adult, and a cool addition to any keychain collection.

BUY RISK-FREE: We fully stand behind our products with a best satisfaction and 100% money-back guarantee. Not satisfied with the tape measure keychains? We’ll send you a replacement or issue a full refund. Click ‘Add to Cart’ now to spark huge smiles completely risk-free!
